column1: Smoque BBQ//// "certain people"  who stumble though their lives(  smiling) with their life style settings  stuck( rusted) on Appropriate & Strip the Soul Out of  Real Cultural Offerings Auto Pilot.  Smoque offers Sterile cooked meat for a sterile people.  I remember when Carson's Ribs opened and my Grand Father took me there and was horrified. I'm glade he didn't know how bad it would get.
